articles.title: Scarlett Johansson's AI row has echoes of Silicon Valley's bad old days - BBC.com
articles.description: A clash with the actor has echoes of the macho tech giants of the past, says Zoe Kleinman.
articles.content:
Move fast and break things is a motto that continues to haunt the tech sector, some 20 years after it was coined by a young Mark Zuckerberg.
Those five words came to symbolise Silicon Valley at its … [+8170 chars]
